tool_description: Returns mnemonic words according to bips/bip-0039
name: bis/bip-0039
title: bis/bip-0039

api_list.name: GET
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bis-bip-0039.p.rapidapi.com/bip0039/get"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bis-bip-0039.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
